channel.title: CVE Feed for wpeverest -- User Registration – Custom Registration Form, Login Form And User Profile For WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wpeverest -- User Registration – Custom Registration Form, Login Form And User Profile For WordPress

item.title: CVE-2023-3343|2024-10-17T13:41:15.434Z -- wpeverest -- user%20registration%20%E2%80%93%20custom%20registration%20form%2C%20login%20form%20and%20user%20profile%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The User Registration plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to PHP Object Injection in versions up to, and including, 3.0.1 via deserialization of untrusted input from the 'profile-pic-url' parameter. This allows authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level permissions and above, to inject a PHP Object. No POP chain is present in the vulnerable plugin. If a POP chain is present via an additional plugin or theme installed on the target system, it could allow the attacker to delete arbitrary files, retrieve sensitive data, or execute code.
